errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

http.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input.
http.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
http.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
http.conflict: This action conflicts with existing data.
http.tooLarge: The file is too large. Please upload a smaller file.
http.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
http.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
http.badGateway: External service error. Please try again later.

network.timeout: Request timed out. Please check your connection.
network.offline: No internet connection. Please check your network.

guests.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
guests.languageNotSupported: The selected language is not supported.
guests.notFoundByEmail: No guest found with this email address.
guests.emailExists: A guest with this email already exists.
guests.wrongWedding: This guest does not belong to this wedding.
guests.invitationFailed: Failed to send invitation email. Please try again.
guests.someNotFound: Some guests could not be found.

events.endDateBeforeStart: End date must be on or after the start date.
events.notAllowed: You don't have permission to modify this event.
events.guestAlreadyInEvent: This guest is already added to this event.
events.guestNotInEvent: This guest is not in this event.

expenses.amountRequired: Expense amount must be greater than 0.

weddings.userAlreadyAdded: This user is already added to the wedding.
weddings.userNotInWedding: This user is not part of the wedding.

billing.freeNoCheckout: Free tier does not require checkout.
billing.checkoutFailed: Could not create checkout session. Please try again.
billing.noCustomer: No billing account found. Please contact support.
billing.portalFailed: Could not open billing portal. Please try again.
billing.lifetimeCheckout: Lifetime plans must be purchased through checkout.
billing.freeNoPaid: Free tier does not require a subscription.
billing.updateFailed: Failed to update subscription. Please try again.

website.subscriptionRequired: Website builder requires a Starter or Pro subscription.
website.alreadyExists: A website already exists for this wedding.

limits.guestLimitReached: You've reached the guest limit for your plan. Please upgrade to add more guests.
limits.eventLimitReached: You've reached the event limit for your plan. Please upgrade to add more events.
limits.emailLimitReached: You've reached the monthly email limit for your plan. Please upgrade or wait until next month.
